PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-11492022-10-20,  ,  ,  ,  ,  NR,  CRA
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectFrank Granata Remission Order
PrecisOrder REMITTING (1) A PORTION OF THE INCOME TAX, and all relevant interest on it, paid or payable by FRANK GRANATA for the 2003, 2004, 2006, 2007 and 2008 taxation years; and (2) THE LATE-FILING PENALTIES ON INCOME TAX, and all relevant interest on it, paid or payable by FRANK GRANATA for the 2006 and 2007 taxation years.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Frank Granata Remission Order
precis: Order REMITTING (1) A PORTION OF THE INCOME TAX, and all relevant interest on it, paid or payable by FRANK GRANATA for the 2003, 2004, 2006, 2007 and 2008 taxation years; and (2) THE LATE-FILING PENALTIES ON INCOME TAX, and all relevant interest on it, paid or payable by FRANK GRANATA for the 2006 and 2007 taxation years.
